posts.post_content:
There are seven sevens on this card:  
-7 power  
-7 toughness  
-7 CMC  
-7 cards exiled  
-7 lines of text  
-7 in the card number ('71')  
-7 Demons in the artwork

Posted By: psychichobo (1/29/2013 2:56:21 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
He's good, but not super awesome. A seven flyer for seven mana is... well... ok. He sadly has no trample whatsoever, so can be chumpblocked by flying tokens (and there are flying token generators in this set) all day long.  
The ability is nice, but is curiously worse on such a large beater than it would be on a smaller creature. If you manage to hit a player with this guy several times, then that player is dead due to the damage anyway, no matter whether you snag some creatures or not.  
  
A difference is Commander, there this guy is already better.  
  
3/5
posts.html:
He's good, but not super awesome. A seven flyer for seven mana is... well... ok. He sadly has no trample whatsoever, so can be chumpblocked by flying tokens (and there are flying token generators in this set) all day long.
The ability is nice, but is curiously worse on such a large beater than it would be on a smaller creature. If you manage to hit a player with this guy several times, then that player is dead due to the damage anyway, no matter whether you snag some creatures or not.

A difference is Commander, there this guy is already better.

3/5

Posted By: Oatbran (5/8/2013 9:51:16 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
A really neat card. I especially like the colour-scheme in the artwork. Really awesome piece.  
  
The Function  
  
Sure it'd be great with Trample though at the same time I'm glad he doesn't have it. I mean, how many big guys with Trample do we really need? It'd get pretty boring for me if they all had it and cards like this that don't have one thing or another just provide the opportunity for people to explore different options for giving creatures what they feel is necessary depending on what deck they are using.  
  
I also don't feel like his milling ability is at all useless by the time you even get him onto the battlefield. Really all depends on who you're going up against. There are so many variables in any given game and I've definitely had my fair share of rounds where his ability is totally welcome by the time I get him out. Or what about the situation where you're having a 3+ person game. By the time you get him out, who says anyone is even near 0 life? The fact that you can swing one... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
A really neat card. I especially like the colour-scheme in the artwork. Really awesome piece.

The Function

Sure it'd be great with Trample though at the same time I'm glad he doesn't have it. I mean, how many big guys with Trample do we really need? It'd get pretty boring for me if they all had it and cards like this that don't have one thing or another just provide the opportunity for people to explore different options for giving creatures what they feel is necessary depending on what deck they are using.

I also don't feel like his milling ability is at all useless by the time you even get him onto the battlefield. Really all depends on who you're going up against. There are so many variables in any given game and I've definitely had my fair share of rounds where his ability is totally welcome by the time I get him out. Or what about the situation where you're having a 3+ person game. By the time you get him out, who says anyone is even near 0 life? The fact that you can swing one... (see all)

posts.post_content:
7/7 that costs ![4](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=4&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol), flies, mills your opponent's deck, steals one of his creatures, and has no drawbacks? This can't be! I thought this creature was black?!  
  
In any case, and as others have already pointed out, this guy needs *trample*. I can't help but feel ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) got the short end of the stick in **Gatecrash** (cf ![White](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=W&type=symbol))...
